Text:
The mp3 extension does not work properly. Windows Media player, Classic or even BsPlayer pro can't read the files.
dBPower Amp doesn't recognize the files, so there's no way to convert them to an other format.

What the hell is the matter...? I dunno, but there's an other .ogg "Devils and Dust" torrent available.
Don't try this one, unless you got time and/or a miraculous player.
i had the same problem, wft is going on?
